sentences.en: [as modifier]the judge directed the jury to return a not guilty verdict.
sentences.cn: 法官命令陪审团重新作出无罪的裁决。

sentences.en: Four men were found guilty of breach of the peace.
sentences.cn: 四名男子被判扰乱治安罪名成立。

sentences.en: He pleaded guilty to charges of misappropriation of bank funds.
sentences.cn: 他对挪用银行资金的指控供认不讳。

sentences.en: He pleaded guilty to two charges of theft.
sentences.cn: 他承认两项盗窃罪名。

sentences.en: He was found not guilty of the death of PC Jones.
sentences.cn: 关于警员琼斯的死，他被判无罪。

sentences.en: He's hoping that if he makes me feel guilty, I'll retract.
sentences.cn: 他指望着如果他能让我感到内疚，我就会收回所说的话。

sentences.en: Her plea of guilty to manslaughter through provocation was rejected.
sentences.cn: 她因受到挑衅而过失杀人的有罪答辩被驳回。

sentences.en: I feel so guilty and angry about the whole issue.
sentences.cn: 我对整件事深感内疚和气愤。

sentences.en: If a crime occurs then there is, ipso facto, a guilty party.
sentences.cn: 如果犯罪发生了，那么根据事实本身，就会有有罪的一方。

sentences.en: It was his guilty conscience that made him offer to help.
sentences.cn: 他是因为良心上过意不去才提出帮忙的。

sentences.en: Malcolm believed he was guilty of duplicity in his private dealings.
sentences.cn: 马尔科姆认为他在为其私底下两面派的行为而心生愧疚。

sentences.en: She looked self-conscious and guilty.
sentences.cn: 她看上去很不自然，很内疚的样子。

sentences.en: She would be guilty of betraying her own mother.
sentences.cn: 她会犯下背叛自己母亲的错误。

sentences.en: Some journalists are guilty of reporting scandal in order to sell papers.
sentences.cn: 有些记者为增加报纸销量而去报道丑闻，这种做法不对。

sentences.en: Striker Alan Smith was guilty of two glaring misses.
sentences.cn: 前锋艾伦·史密斯两次严重失误，将球射偏。

sentences.en: The pro-gramme's researchers are guilty of bias and misrepresentation.
sentences.cn: 该项目的研究者们对心存偏见和误解感到非常内疚。

sentences.en: They pleaded guilty to lesser charges of criminal damage.
sentences.cn: 他们承认了刑事毁坏的较轻罪名。

sentences.en: They pleaded guilty to possessing material likely to incite racial hatred.
sentences.cn: 他们表示认罪，承认拥有可能煽动民族仇恨的材料。

sentences.en: They were found guilty of acts of gross indecency.
sentences.cn: 他们因存在严重猥亵行为而被判有罪。

sentences.en: When they found us guilty, I just went blank.
sentences.cn: 当他们判定我们有罪时，我的脑子顿时一片空白。

sentences.en: When we feel anger, we bury the emotion and feel guilty instead.
sentences.cn: 当我们感到愤怒时，压抑这种情绪反而会觉得内疚。

words.tran_cn: 无罪的，无辜的；没有…的，不知…的

trans.tran_en: feeling very ashamed and sad because you know that you have done something wrong
